verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And [when] the people כְּמִתְאֹ֣נְנִ֔ים <S%H596><s%> ke-mit-'O-ne-Nim, complained רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' of adversity בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei the hearing יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD וַיִּ֣חַר <S%H2734><s%> vai-Yi-char was kindled אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> ap-Po, [it] and his anger וַתִּבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> vat-tiv-'ar- burnt בָּם֙ bam אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh and the fire יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַתֹּ֖אכַל <S%H398><s%> vat-To-chal among them and consumed בִּקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> bik-Tzeh [them that were] in the uttermost parts הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Ham-ma-cha-Neh. of the camp

וַיִּצְעַ֥ק <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-'Ak cried הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; unto Moses וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> vai-yit-pal-Lel prayed מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh and when Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וַתִּשְׁקַ֖ע <S%H8257><s%> vat-tish-Ka' was quenched הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh. the fire

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra And he called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu of the תַּבְעֵרָ֑ה <S%H8404><s%> tav-'e-Rah; Taberah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because בָעֲרָ֥ה <S%H1197><s%> va-'a-Rah burnt בָ֖ם vam אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh because the fire יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהָֽאסַפְסֻף֙ <S%H628><s%> ve-ha-saf-Suf And the mixt multitude אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bo, that [was] among הִתְאַוּ֖וּ <S%H183><s%> hit-'av-Vu had תַּאֲוָ֑ה <S%H8378><s%> ta-'a-Vah; greedy וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu again וַיִּבְכּ֗וּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-yiv-Ku, also wept גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> gam and also בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יַאֲכִלֵ֖נוּ <S%H398><s%> ya-'a-chi-Le-nu to eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar. Who shall give us flesh

זָכַ֙רְנוּ֙ <S%H2142><s%> za-Char-nu We remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּגָ֔ה <S%H1710><s%> had-da-Gah, the fish אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> no-Chal which we did eat בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim in Egypt חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam; freely אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַקִּשֻּׁאִ֗ים <S%H7180><s%> hak-kish-shu-'Im, the cucumbers וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָֽאֲבַטִּחִ֔ים <S%H20><s%> ha-'a-vat-ti-Chim, and the melons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הֶחָצִ֥יר <S%H2682><s%> he-cha-Tzir and the leeks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַבְּצָלִ֖ים <S%H1211><s%> hab-be-tza-Lim and the onions וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשּׁוּמִֽים׃ <S%H7762><s%> hash-shu-Mim. and the garlick

[before] our eyes

וּבְרֶ֧דֶת <S%H3381><s%> u-ve-Re-det fell הַטַּ֛ל <S%H2919><s%> hat-Tal And when the dew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh upon the camp לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; in the night יֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> ye-Red fell הַמָּ֖ן <S%H4478><s%> ham-Man the manna עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and
